description: Dunc`s Tyranitar appears to be his main Pokémon. During its first battle with Mewtwo, its Hyper Beam caused a rock slide which trapped Dunc`s Escavalier. During the second encounter with Mewtwo, its Poké Ball was crushed and destroyed by Mewtwo. It consequently left its trainer Dunc.
name: Bangiras (Dunc)
